name: Zowie EC2-CW Wireless
description: Professional esports mouse with wireless freedom. Features legendary EC2 ergonomic shape, 3370 sensor, and driverless plug-and-play design. Pure performance, no distractions.

reviews.review_text: EC2 shape wireless. Dreams do come true.
No software means no issues. Just works.
Wish it was lighter but shape is unbeatable.
